name: Lonely UFO (SystemNobody)
description:
First game I have made. It took me about 2 weeks. Its purpose was to learn Unity.

Controls:
  • W - jump
  • R - reset position
  • ESC - open menu

You can start the game with any key.

- Music - Concentration Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
